songs.title: Simple Song
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Wake up, here I go
Cram it all down my throat
Stomach's so full that I wish I could choke
7AM, my head's already in a spin
As soon as I'm out that door
Bam, it hits me like a ton of those red bricks
Can't dig myself out of this highest ditch
This madness

[Pre-Chorus]
I swear, sometimes
I can't tell which way is up
Which way is down
It's all up in my face, need to push it away
Somebody, push it away
So all that I can hear

[Chorus]
Is a simple song
Sing along now
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la

[Verse 2]
Mid-day sun beating on the concrete
Burning up my feet
Too many cars on the street
The noise, the red, the green
Makes me wanna scream
5 o'clock, now it's bumper on bumper, on bumper
Horns honking
Nobody's looking, but everybody's talking
Just another day on this highway

[Pre-Chorus]
I swear, sometimes
I can't tell which way is up
Which way is down
It's all up in my face, need to push it away
Somebody, push it away
'Cause all I wanna hear, oh

[Chorus]
Is a simple song, mmm
Sing along now
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la

[Breakdown]
Hey
Sing along now
(La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la)
Sing along
(La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la)

[Bridge]
What I'd give to turn it off
And make it stop, make it stop
You gotta make it stop
So all that I can hear

[Chorus]
Is a simple song, mmm
Sing along now
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la

[Outro]
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la
